page.title: 05ALL SAINTS' SCHOOL FAIR
page.content: On{11th July 1985}we had our{school} {fair.}There were all kinds of stalls.There was a game in which you had to pick out a whole egg from a tray of sand with lots of hidden broken egg shells.If you found the whole egg you won Â£1.The other stalls were selling toys, books, flowers, plants,games,tins of food and cakes.There was a raffle and one of the prizes was a huge basket of fruit given by{Geests}who are banana and general fruit wholesalers based in Shildon.The Police came to the Fair to show the police dogs and give a display.One of the policemen put on a leather arm protector and pretended that he was a criminal.The police dog chased him and bit through the protector,piercing the policeman's arm with his teeth.We raised over{Â£250}for our{School Fund.}
